short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transformers Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Transformers background. Transformers wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Cycle through various Transformers wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Switch up your Transformers background or pin your favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Google-powered search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel addition for rapid website access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to More Themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Immediate access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick access to games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Transformers new tab.
